mapper.update: update sys_menu set MENU_NAME = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENU_IMG = #{menuImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENU_TYPE = #{menuType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PARENT_MENU_ID = #{parentMenuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MENU_NEXT_ID = #{menuNextId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MENU_URL = #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENU_REMARK = #{menuRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT} where MENU_ID = #{menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, MENU_IMG, MENU_TYPE, PARENT_MENU_ID, MENU_NEXT_ID, MENU_URL, MENU_REMARK, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF from sys_menu where MENU_ID = #{menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, MENU_IMG, MENU_TYPE, PARENT_MENU_ID, MENU_NEXT_ID, MENU_URL, MENU_REMARK, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF from sys_menu
